title: Like Sleeping on the Job? Make $400,000 a Year Snoozing on TikTok
description: Webcams fixed on people sleeping draw a growing online audience and offer a potentially lucrative bedroom business for so-called sleep streamers. ‘I find it super soothing, like almost as companionship in an odd way.’

title: Coming Soon for Homeowners: Solar Panels That Actually Look Attractive
description: Among the possibilities are solar cells that can be sprayed on like paint.

title: Elon Musk, Tesla Board Members to Defend CEO's Pay in Court
description: Elon Musk is headed to court this week in Delaware to defend his multibillion-dollar compensation package at Tesla.

title: Departure of Tech Workers Weighs on Russian Economy
description: President Vladimir Putin’s troop mobilization for the Ukraine war has caused sales to drop and well-paid employees to flee abroad.
